list_definition.definition: a dish or other container for cigarette ash

list_ex_of_english: There must be ashtrays, just as there must be separate areas in which smokers can smoke and non-smokers can feel comfortable.
I am fed up with waking up every morning to the smell of stale cigarettes from ashtrays around the bedroom.
One is clearly an ashtray, the other is not.
It was like getting into a smouldering ashtray.
However, whereas one might have a closed shop for making plastic ashtrays, one cannot have one when one is dealing with artistic or literary talent.
These devices can be disguised as ashtrays or cigarette packets.
This general tendency toward implicit modalizing is confirmed by the ashtray task.
She was hit with ashtrays when the employers became displeased with her.
